title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the BugHuntingChallenge platform, including features, user roles, gamification elements, security considerations, and non-functional requirements (performance, scalability, maintainability, etc.). Ensure that the requirements cover both functional and non-functional aspects, and involve relevant stakeholders (developers, QA, security, etc.) in the process.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components, as well as their interactions and communication protocols. Ensure the architecture follows best practices for maintainability, modularity, scalability, and security. Consider edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and gamification aspects. The architecture should support features like user authentication, code submission, bug reporting, leaderboards, and challenge management.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the user interface, focusing on usability, accessibility, gamification elements, responsive design for various devices, and integration with the backend functionality.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services, including user authentication, challenge management, scoring system, and integration with external code repositories.

title: Implement Frontend User Interface
description: Develop the frontend user interface based on the approved designs, integrating with the backend services and implementing gamification elements.

title: Set up Database and Data Models
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models required for storing user data, challenge data, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures such as user authentication, data encryption, input validation, and protection against common web vulnerabilities.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application to various environments.

title: Create Test Plans and Test Cases
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases for all aspects of the application, including functional, integration, and performance testing.

title: Write User Documentation and Tutorials
description: Create user documentation, tutorials, and help resources to assist users in understanding and effectively using the BugHuntingChallenge platform.
